max_tokens.info: Maximum number of tokens to generate. Set to 0 for unlimited.

model_kwargs.info: Additional keyword arguments to pass to the model.

json_mode.info: If True, it will output JSON regardless of passing a schema.

api_base.info: Base URL for API requests. Defaults to https://api.deepseek.com

seed.info: The seed controls the reproducibility of the job.

errors.langchain_import_failed: langchain-openai not installed. Please install with `pip install langchain-openai`

logs.no_api_key: No API key provided, using default models list
logs.building_model: Building DeepSeek model - Model: {model}, Temperature: {temperature}, Max Tokens: {max_tokens}
logs.openai_not_available: OpenAI package not available for error message extraction
